name: Product Marketing Manager
description:
Brane is a global marketing company based in Singapore. We help growth-stage products to design and execute scalable user acquisition strategy. We are the trusted partner of 100+ leading companies as Facebook, eBuy, Alibaba Group, King and others.

Now we are looking for a Product Marketing Manager. You'll partner with analytics, user acquisition and creative teams to ensure they're successful.

This position can be based anywhere in the world (working remotely).

What you’ll be doing:

  • Lead marketing campaign planning, resource management and delivery;
  • Deliver large projects end-to-end across the marketing team;
  • Lead the communication and dissemination of information between all working teams
  • Creates campaign recaps and presents them with special attention to detail on key performance indicators

What you’ll bring:

  • 2+ year experience in marketing;
  • Strong communication skills;
  • Exemplary leadership and customer service skills;
  • Excellent analytical, negotiation, communication, and problem-solving skills.

What you’ll get:

  • Company as a Community culture;
  • Brane is fully remote;
  • Hourly & Sales Compensation Plan.
